posts.post_content:
Hello all,

WTB a Frank Smith (F Smith version) T206 PSA 6 or higher.  Probably can’t afford anything above a 7 at this point but also happy to look at those if you have.  I may have some trade bait - more likely looking to do cash.  Back agnostic, but I do like off backs.

Feel free to email [url]Paul.curlee1@gmail.com[/url] or text me at 915-449-7623.  Thanks!

[quote name="Paulcurlee1" post=2231520]Back agnostic...[/QUOTE]

I really like that phrase.  I suppose back atheist would mean you don't believe that card backs exist.  :p
I love good back just as much as the next guy, however if, for example, I was searching for a psa 6 white Sox hindu brown I’d be SOL as they were printed on unobtanium
